aboutMe.content: Hi! everyone who lost in here, I'm Methit Sompitak, a  computer engineer who passion in programing and infrastructure, I had experience in software development even if it isn't working experience and stronge on solving problems, have responsible, time management and eager to learning although I didn't good at chatting but I have a open mind and welcome to talk with everyone

detail: Borrow tool sets system, We collection data what each model of product need which consist many component such as color, model name, structure of product or location each component in warehouse for helping employee and improve productivity, furthermore, we collect borrow data who borrow?, who borrower?, who accepts returns?, what's time do they borrow and return, status of each borrowing and reporting to PDF file and CSV file
